mapper.sql: cc.id, cc.create_by, cc.create_time, cc.update_by, cc.update_time, cc.del_flag, cc.coupon_grant_id, cc.coupon_grant_record_id, cc.customer_id, cc.expire_time, cc.coupon_name, cc.coupon_type, cc.coupon_status
mapper.select: select from qingshi.customer_coupon cc where cc.customer_id = #{userId} and cc.coupon_status <= 2 and cc.del_flag = 0 and cc.expire_time > now() order by cc.coupon_status, cc.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select from qingshi.customer_coupon cc where cc.del_flag = 0 and cc.customer_id = #{userId} and cc.expire_time < now() order by cc.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select from qingshi.customer_coupon cc where cc.del_flag = 0 and cc.customer_id = #{userId} and cc.expire_time > now() and cc.id > #{lastId} order by cc.id desc
